thread.title: Union women support ccommitment to gender representation
thread.title_full: Union women support ccommitment to gender representation

title: Union women support ccommitment to gender representation
text:
Union women support ccommitment to gender representation Thursday, 15 October 2015, 11:34 am 
CTU Women's Council 
Union women support Green Party commitment to gender representation 
The CTU Women's Council is supporting the Greens announcement made today at the CTU biennial conference. 
"It's wonderful that the Greens are taking a lead in guaranteeing equal representation of women in their own ministerial line up and in cabinet," CTU Women's Council spokesperson Sheryl Cadman said. 
"Gender does matter. More women in Parliament focuses attention on making our country better for all, including for women," Cadman said. 
ENDS
